title: Dislocations, sprains and strains involving thorax with lower back and pelvis
chapter: Injury, poisoning and certain other consequences of external causes
category: Dislocations, sprains and strains involving multiple body regions
inclusion: bilateral involvement of limbs of the same body region
Injuries by type involving two or more body regions classifiable within S00-S99
Dislocations, sprains and strains of sites classifiable to S23.-, S33.- and T09.2
exclusion: multiple injuries involving only one body region - see S-section
when combined with dislocations, sprains and strains of other body region(s)
